description: This Dart source file defines a ReservationsProvider class that manages a list of reservation objects, allowing adding and cancelling reservations, and notifying listeners of changes. It's part of a Flutter application handling restaurant reservations.

classes.name: ReservationsProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier that manages a list of Reservation objects, providing methods to add and cancel reservations and notify listeners about updates.

methods.name: addReservation
methods.description: Adds a reservation to the list at the beginning and notifies listeners.

methods.name: cancel
methods.description: Cancels a reservation by setting its status to canceled and notifies listeners.
